divs: Sighting Detailsabout 3-4 times a year on an island in our First Nation a bright light appears to land on the island. It is an on going situation that the elders even speak about. I have seen this phenomenon about a dozen times. Phone in evenings for further details.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Dryden
There were no other sightings in Dryden on or around July 31st 2006
